mapper.select: select service_servicename as "serviceName", role_id as "RoleId", ServicePermission as "ServicePermission" from services_roles_permission where role_id=#{roleId} and service_servicename = #{serviceName}
mapper.insert: insert into services_roles_permission (service_servicename, role_id, ServicePermission) values (#{serviceName}, #{roleId}, #{ServicePermission})
